content.raw:
> Error loading configuration file [/tmp/my_config.yaml]

I think the problem started with pull request #88, which hardcoded `fuel.ignitionrobotics.org` as the default server.

> Changing the return value to true in LoadConfig(), i.e. removing this line, fixed the example. 

Your solution sounds reasonable to me. We could change the error to a warning and don't fail loading the config. Mind adding that to this PR?
content.html:
Error loading configuration file [/tmp/my_config.yaml]

I think the problem started with pull request #88, which hardcoded fuel.ignitionrobotics.org as the default server.

Changing the return value to true in LoadConfig(), i.e. removing this line, fixed the example.

Your solution sounds reasonable to me. We could change the error to a warning and don't fail loading the config. Mind adding that to this PR?
